name: Stone Valley 22 AutoDrive
description:
68 Waypoints covering Fields, Farms, Productions and Fill and Sell Points.

  • North Valley Bales has tight gateways on the approach and exit, needs narrow tractor/trailers. (You may need to manually unload too)

Please let me know if you find anything wrong or doesn't work and I will try and get a fix done and new version uploaded.

Please use the comments section or you can find me on Discord @ https://discord.gg/wWyH4GgpPP
